mean_en: involving the use of skill and the imagination to produce something new or a work of art; having the skill and ability to produce something new, especially a work of art; showing this ability
sentence: She is a very creative person, especially when she is drawing.
sentence_trans: 她是一个很有创造性的人，尤其是画画的时候。
word_etyma: cre增长，产生 + ative形容词后缀，具有……性质的 → creative有创造性的
